page.title: 07Wepre Park
page.content: {Wepre Park}is situated in a nice peaceful place. There is something for all ages . For the young ones there are the play areas. Like any other park it's got swings, seasaws, climbing frames a paddling pool in the summer and a tunnel. For the teenager there's a big man made pond. This is stocked with lots of different species of fish. There are roach, pike etc. There are also newts, frogs , and tadpoles. For the 30-40's there's a golf course . Then for the others there's the wood. The woodlands lead to{Ewloe {Castle.}On the way there you pass rivers and mixed woodland. Animals like rabbits, badgers, squirrels live in the park. In all Wepre Park is ideal for all ages. { Paul Coppack
